reviewText: This is an awesome production!!! We have seen this live for 2 yrs now.. its an awesome & gripping production.. You will laugh, you will cry & you will cheer!!! John Bolin also wrote a 50 day devotional, I sent these out to 5 ppl!!! its uplifting & some what comical (in a good way).. He uses "today" references to keep your attention while "slipping in" some wonderful words of Christ!!! The Thorn is amazing, a must see!!!
Overacted to a point of distraction. BTW, Christ is unlikely some white guy with a beard but an ordinary yet divine "man of sorrows" from the Middle East.
